strengths: Extreme flexibility — can pivot to any strategy
weaknesses: Metagame vulnerability — everyone knows you're strong
Specific threats: Saar, Sardakk, Nekro, Mentak, Yin
tips: Acquire one tech per turn while establishing a defensive position and scoring objectives
Build economy through trading (limited early planet control capability)
Sell racial promissory note every turn; be transparent about tech provision expectations
Round 2 War Sun is possible — withhold promissory note until after acquisition if pursuing this
Avoid early victory positioning; maintain friendly stance and execute trades
Infantry/ground combat is your critical weakness — always bring extra ground forces
The -1 combat modifier becomes less significant with larger vessels (dreadnoughts, war suns)
